ðŸ“˜ **Ask â€” quick assistant**

You are using /ask â€” a Discord app for quick answers, web searches and image generation. Use /ask <anything> to ask questions, get summaries, brainstorm, draft text, or generate images.

â€¢ Common uses:
  â€¢ Quick explanations and definitions
  â€¢ Summaries and rewrites
  â€¢ Drafts (emails, messages, agendas)
  â€¢ Short code snippets and debugging hints
  â€¢ Brainstorming and idea generation
  â€¢ Web searches for quick facts and sources
  â€¢ Image generation for simple illustrative assets

â€¢ Examples:
  â€¢ /ask explain recursion in simple terms
  â€¢ /ask summarize the last 3 messages
  â€¢ /ask draft a 3-item meeting agenda about onboarding
  â€¢ /ask generate a simple red circle on a white background --image

â€¢ Where it works:
  â€¢ Server channels (GUILD_TEXT)
  â€¢ Group DMs (GROUP_DM)
  â€¢ Direct messages with the app (APP_DM)

â€¢ Notes:
  â€¢ Avoid sending passwords or other sensitive personal data.
  â€¢ Replies are based only on the input you provide here.
  â€¢ Image generation and web search results may be restricted by content policy.

Manage or install the app: 
https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=1460830876345569372
